Judul: The role of the Cu dopant on a Mn3O4 spinel SCR catalyst: Improvement of low-temperature activity and sulfur resistance
Abstrak:
Mn-based oxides are regarded as one of the most promising catalysts for selective catalytic reduction (SCR) of
NOx by NH3 at low temperatures, but their applications are extremely restricted by the irreversible poisoning of
SO2. Improving the SO2 tolerance of Mn-based catalyst has longtime received the most attentions from both
academia and industry. In this work, a series of Cu-modified Mn3O4 spinels were synthesized, and the roles of the Cu dopant were investigated.....
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Yue Penga, Dong Wanga, Nan Huanga, Qinfang Zhangb, Shijian Yangc, Jianjun Chena, Junhua Lia
Kata Kunci: Poisoning of SO2, low temperature SCR, Cu doping, Spinel, SO2 tolerance
